attributes.action: give our children leaving school more oppertunities, eg. apprentaships, collages offering much more places, eg. in plastering, brick laying, carpentry, decorating, ect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are only few places in collages for placements for all the above, and more. we would like more placements and not such a high standard of qualifications, many children who are practical are not always as good at writting. Please give all our children the chance to learn a good trade
